title: 3rd sem ECE special topics
content: Hi, I am a 3rd sem ECE student. I would like to know what are the special topics (if any) that are offered to ECE students during the 3rd and 4th semesters. Also, how are special topics different from minors? Thank you:)

comments.body:
The electives that the ECE department offers changes for every batch depending on the teachers and how many people choose the electives. If less than 30 people choose an elective, it'll be cancelled and the students who picked it will be asked to select a different one which has a strength of more than 30. The electives for each year keep changing and what we had might not be the same ones you have.

Minors are seperate subjects taught by another department. Unlike electives, they're completely optional and do not affect your final grade in any way. They have teachers from other departments that take classes for you outside clg hours and have seperate ISAs and ESAs. You also need to pay to take up each of these courses either during college or in the holidays. It's 2500 per credit for any cs minor course
This is really helpful. Thanks a lot for the reply:))

Electives are basically subjects that you need to choose in sem 5 and 6. You'll have 2 electives for 4 credits in both the semesters. You'll have to choose from whatever subjects the department offers in that semester
